@usedefault
{{editaccount accountId:$$id}}

@@title Account: ${name}
{{Account id:$$id}}
{% if id %}
h2. Account: ${name}

{{actions:
- display: Edit
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/update
  input:
  - name: name
    label: Name
    placeholder:
    type: text
    default: ${name}

  - name: maxMemoryCapacity
    label: Max Memory Capacity (GB)
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: float
    default: ${maxMemoryCapacity}

  - name: maxVDiskCapacity
    label: Max VDisk Capacity (GB)
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: number
    default: ${maxVDiskCapacity}

  - name: maxCPUCapacity
    label: Max Number of CPU Cores
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: number
    default: ${maxCPUCapacity}

  - name: maxNASCapacity
    label: Max Primary Storage(NAS) Capacity (TB)
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: number
    default: ${maxNASCapacity}

  - name: maxArchiveCapacity
    label: Max Secondary Storage(Archive) Capacity (TB)
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: number
    default: ${maxArchiveCapacity}

  - name: maxNetworkOptTransfer
    label: Max Network Transfer In Operator (GB)
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: number
    default: ${maxNetworkOptTransfer}

  - name: maxNetworkPeerTransfer
    label: Max Network Transfer Peering (GB)
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: number
    default: ${maxNetworkPeerTransfer}

  - name: maxNumPublicIP
    label: Max Number of Public IP Addresses
    placeholder: set to -1 if no limits should be set
    type: number
    default: ${maxNumPublicIP}

  - name: accountId
    type: hidden
    value: $$id


- display: Disable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/disable
  data:
   accountId: $$id
   async: true
  input:
  - reason

- display: Enable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/enable
  reload: false
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - reason

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/delete
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - reason

- display: Grant User Access
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/addUser
  hide: true
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - name: username
    label: Username or email address (an invitation will be sent to unregistered emails)
    type: text
  - name: accesstype
    type: dropdown
    label: ACL
    values:
     - label: Admin
       value: ARCXDU
     - label: Write
       value: RCX
     - label: Read
       value: R

- display: Revoke User Access
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/deleteUser
  hide: true
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - name: recursivedelete
    type: dropdown
    label: Do you want to recursively remove user permissions from all owned cloudspaces and vmachines?
    values:
     - label: 'Yes'
       value: true
     - label: 'No'
       value: false

- display: Change Credit
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/finance/changeCredit
  hide: true
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - name: amount
    label: Credit Amount (can be negative)
    type: number
  - name: message
    label: Reason for transaction
    type: text
}}

{{createspace: accountId:$$id}}

h3. Details
|*Account ID*|$$id|
|*Location*|${DCLocation}|
|*Status*|${status}|
|*Balance (current USD in account)*|${balance}|
|*Max Memory Capacity*|{% if maxMemoryCapacity == "-1" %} Unlimited {% else %} ${maxMemoryCapacity} GB {% endif %}|
|*Max VDisk Capacity*|{% if maxVDiskCapacity == "-1" %} Unlimited {% else %} ${maxVDiskCapacity} GB {% endif %}|
|*Max Number of CPU Cores*| {% if maxCPUCapacity == "-1" %} Unlimited {% else %} ${maxCPUCapacity} {% endif %} |
|*Max Primary Storage(NAS) Capacity*| {% if maxNASCapacity == "-1" %} Unlimited {% else %}${maxNASCapacity} TB {% endif %}|
|*Max Secondary Storage(Archive) Capacity*| {% if maxArchiveCapacity == "-1" %} Unlimited {% else %} ${maxArchiveCapacity} TB {% endif %}|
|*Max Network Transfer In Operator*|{% if maxNetworkOptTransfer == "-1" %} Unlimited {% else %}${maxNetworkOptTransfer} GB {% endif %}|
|*Max Network Transfer Peering*| {%if maxNetworkPeerTransfer == "-1" %} Unlimited {% else %}${maxNetworkPeerTransfer} GB {% endif %}|
|*Max Number of Public IP Addresses*|{% if maxNumPublicIP == "-1" %} Unlimited {%else %}${maxNumPublicIP} {%endif %}|

h3. Users Access
{{action: id:'action-GrantUserAccess' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-plus margin-bottom-medium margin-left-medium' label:'Grant User Access'}}
||User Name||E-Mail||ACL||Status||Revoke Access||
{% for user in users -%}
    | {%if user.userstatus!='INVITED' %} [${user.id}|/CBGrid/user?id=${user.id}] {%else%} ${user.id} {% endif %} |${", ".join(user.emails)}|${user.acl}|${user.userstatus if user.userstatus else 'N/A'}|{{action deleterow:true id:'action-RevokeUserAccess' data-username:'${user.id}' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-remove'}}|
{% endfor %}

h3. Cloud Spaces
{{action: id:'create_space' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-plus margin-bottom-medium margin-left-medium' label:'Add Cloud Space'}}
{{cbspaces: accountId:$$id}}

h3. Credit Transactions

{{action: id:'action-ChangeCredit' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-plus margin-bottom-medium margin-left-medium' label:'Add Credit'}}
{{transactions: accountId:$$id}}
{{actions: gridbinding:'table_cloudbroker_cloudspace cloudspaceIds'
- display: Destroy Cloudspaces
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/destroyCloudSpaces
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  reload: false
  input:
  - reason
  }}
{% else %}
No account provided
{% endif %}
